title.rendered: I just didn’t agree with a lot of his opinions: Mark Waugh on commentating with Karthik

content.rendered:
Former Australian batter Mark Waugh, who provided commentary for the first two Test matches between India and Australia, said he “just didn’t” concur with many of Dinesh Karthik’s viewpoints. Waugh continued,

He couldn’t figure out my field options, etc. In order to balance out the commentary box in India, he continued, “I think Mitchell Johnson has taken over my role in the next two Tests with Matthew Hayden.

Read More: Women to get free entry to matches in the inaugural season of WPL
